values.value:
When set to 'true' (default), the Apex or JavaScript stack trace will be parsed on each log entry & used to set the fields LogEntryEvent__e.OriginLocation__c, LogEntry__c.OriginLocation__c & LogEntry__c.StackTrace__c will be saved in your org.
When set to 'false', stack traces will not be parsed - this can conserve CPU usage, at the expense of losing some data about log entries.
